findings.title: Unprotected approve function
findings.description: The approve function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential manipulation of allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected transfer function
findings.description: The _transfer function does not have any access control or validation, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the contract's funds.

findings.title: Unprotected transferFrom function
findings.description: The transferFrom function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized token transfers.

findings.title: Unprotected mint function
findings.description: The mint function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized access and potential exploitation.

findings.title: Unprotected burn function
findings.description: The burn function is unprotected, allowing unauthorized users to burn tokens.

findings.title: Unprotected swap function
findings.description: The swap function does not have any protection or access control, allowing anyone to call it and potentially drain the liquidity pool.

findings.title: Unprotected skim function
findings.description: The skim function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The 'sync' function is unprotected and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior or security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected initialize function
findings.description: The initialize function is unprotected, which can lead to unauthorized access and potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected deliver function
findings.description: The 'deliver' function does not have sufficient protection, making it vulnerable to potential attacks.

findings.title: Unprotected increaseAllowance function
findings.description: The increaseAllowance function lacks protection, potentially leading to unauthorized allowance increases.

findings.title: Unprotected decreaseAllowance function
findings.description: The decreaseAllowance function does not have any protection or access control, which can lead to unauthorized changes to allowances.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromReward function
findings.description: The excludeFromReward function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInReward function
findings.description: The includeInReward function lacks proper protection mechanisms, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected _transferBothExcluded function
findings.description: The _transferBothExcluded function lacks protection, potentially allowing unauthorized access or manipulation.

findings.title: Unprotected excludeFromFee function
findings.description: The excludeFromFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected includeInFee function
findings.description: The includeInFee function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected updateWalletLimit function
findings.description: The updateWalletLimit function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected changeTaxFeeWallet function
findings.description: The changeTaxFeeWallet function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker to modify the tax fee wallet.

findings.title: Unprotected changeCharityWallet function
findings.description: The changeCharityWallet function is unprotected and can be modified by unauthorized users.

findings.title: Unprotected changeBurnWallet function
findings.description: The changeBurnWallet function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected setNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function
findings.description: The setNumTokensSellToAddToLiquidity function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.

findings.title: Unprotected setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function
findings.description: The setSwapAndLiquifyEnabled function is unprotected and can be exploited by an attacker.
